==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|や|お|ちょう}}

===Etymology===
Said to derive from {{ja-l|八百屋|やおや|yaoya}} "green grocer", perhaps from a particular [[grocer]] suspected of rigging [[sumo]] matches.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|やおちょう}}
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}

#{{lb|ja|sports}} [[match fixing]]; [[collusion]] to pre-determine the outcome of a game or match, usually for [[gambling]] purposes

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|やおちょう}}

# {{lb|ja|sports}} to [[fix]] a match; to [[rig]] an outcome
